original: intros us H1 H2. unfold GBarlR. intros a. induction us as [|b us' IH]. - intros. inversion H2. - simpl in H2. apply MinD_min in H2 as [H3 H4]. destruct IH as [IH1 IH2]. apply declt. apply H3. apply ProdRel_next with (p := (a,b)) in H4. + apply H4. + apply H1. + auto. + auto. + apply leq_refl.
